comments:
When trying to perform hyperlink navigation or open selection on an external 
file, I got an error dialog "Error Executing Command
"Open Selection did not complete normally.  Please see the log for more 
information.

Reason:
 java.lang.NullPointerException"

And the following was in the log:
!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-07-26 18:42:11.27
!MESSAGE "Open Selection" did not complete normally.  Please see the log for 
more information.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-07-26 18:42:11.37
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

ation(JSPJavaHyperlinkDetector.java:182)

inks(JSPJavaHyperlinkDetector.java:114)
